ISODate.description: A particular point in the progression of time in a calendar year expressed in the YYYY-MM-DD format. This representation is defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.

ISODateTime.description:
A particular point in the progression of time defined by a mandatory date and a mandatory time component, expressed in either UTC time format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ), local time with UTC offset format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss+/-hh:mm), or local time format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss). These representations are defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.
Note on the time format:
1) beginning / end of calendar day
00:00:00 = the beginning of a calendar day
24:00:00 = the end of a calendar day
2) fractions of second in time format
Decimal fractions of seconds may be included. In this case, the involved parties shall agree on the maximum number of digits that are allowed.

Response9Code.description: **  **  **  **  **Result of the performed service.  Code: **APPR:** Approved**:  Definition: Service has been successfuly provided.  Code: **DECL:** Declined**:  Definition: Service is declined.  Code: **PART:** PartialApproved**:  Definition: Service has been partialy provided.  Code: **SUSP:** Suspended**:  Definition: Transaction has been received but hasn't been processed.  Code: **TECH:** TechnicalError**:  Definition: Service cannot be provided for technical reason (eg timeout contacting the Issuer, security problem).

RetailerMessage1Code.description: **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **Identifies the type of process related to the message.  Code: **SSAB:** Abort**:  Definition: Abort the current process or the last request.  Code: **SAAQ:** AdminRequest**:  Definition: To select and start customised administrative services provided by the POI, using a "menu" for an interactive or software interface, initiated by the Sale system.  Code: **SAAP:** AdminResponse**:  Definition: Response to the Admin request.  Code: **SDDR:** DeviceRequest**:  Definition: Request one or several functions of the device, from user Interface or payment peripherals on the POI system or on the Sale system. Functions can be Display, Input, Print, play sound, Card reader capabilities or Transmit a message.  Code: **SDDP:** DeviceResponse**:  Definition: Response to a Device request.  Code: **SSEN:** EventNotification**:  Definition: Notify the other party of an event that occurs on its side.  Code: **SSMQ:** MessageStatusRequest**:  Definition: Request the status of a previous message for which the Sale system has no response.  Code: **SSMR:** MessageStatusResponse**:  Definition: Response to a Message Status request.  Code: **SSRJ:** Rejection**:  Definition: Reject a previous received message, for technical or functional reasons.  Code: **SARQ:** ReportRequest**:  Definition: To request, by the Sale System, a report on a list of transactions on the POI system, or the status of a transaction.  Code: **SARP:** ReportResponse**:  Definition: Response to a Report request.  Code: **SFRP:** SaleFinancialReconciliationResponse**:  Definition: Response to a Reconciliation Request.  Code: **SFRQ:** SaleFinancialReconciliationRequest**:  Definition: Request a reconciliation (different types) between Sale System and POI System.  Code: **SFSQ:** SaleFinancialServiceRequest**:  Definition: Request a financial service like payment, reversal, loyalty, Balance Inquiry, etc.  Code: **SFSP:** SaleFinancialServiceResponse**:  Definition: Response to a financial service request.  Code: **SASQ:** SessionManagementRequest**:  Definition: Request the management of a session: login, logout and diagnosis services. Initiated by the Sale system.  Code: **SASP:** SessionManagementResponse**:  Definition: Response to a session management request to initiate/terminate a session.

RetailerService2Code.description: **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **List of specific services for ServiceRequest  Code: **FSPQ:** FinancialPaymentRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System to perform a payment(Purchase/Refund/PWCB/MOTO Payment/...).  Code: **FSRQ:** FinancialReversalRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System to perform a reversal partial or complete to cancel a former payment service.  Code: **FSIQ:** FinancialBalanceInquiryRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System to perform balance inquiry on the main account.  Code: **FSBQ:** FinancialBatchRequest**:  Definition: The Batch message pair is used to request or get the result of transactions (payment, loyalty and reversal) performed without connection to the Sale system (Payment delivery).  Code: **FSLQ:** FinancialLoyaltyRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System a loyalty service like loading or redeem.  Code: **FSVQ:** FinancialStoredValueRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System to manage a stored value card or account (eg. Load, Payment, Reimbursement).  Code: **FSEQ:** FinancialEnableServiceRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System to enable a service on its side.  Code: **FSAQ:** FinancialCardAcquisitionRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System requests to the POI System to handle a card data acquisition on the card reader.  Code: **FSCQ:** FinancialReconciliationRequest**:  Definition: The Sale System request to the POI System different kinds of transaction reconciliation.

ReversalReason1Code.description: **  **  **  **Reason of the payment or loyalty reversal.  Code: **CUSC:** CustomerCancellation**:  Definition: Customer cancels the transaction.  Code: **MALF:** Malfuntion**:  Definition: Reversal after a suspection of malfunction of the POI system.  Code: **MERC:** MerchantCancellation**:  Definition: Merchant or Cashier cancels the transaction.  Code: **UNAB:** UnableToComplete**:  Definition: POI System unable to complete transaction.

CustomerOrder.description: Specific Customer Order linked with the reversal.

LoyaltyData.description: Data linked to card loyalty during payment.

SaleCapabilities1Code.description: **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **  **Hardware capabilities of the Sale Terminal.  Code: **CHDI:** CashierDisplay**:  Definition: Standard Cashier display interface (to ask question, or to show information).   Code: **CHER:** CashierError**:  Definition: To display to the Cashier information related to an error situation occurring on the POI.  Code: **CHIN:** CashierInput**:  Definition: Any kind of keyboard allowing all or part of the commands 	of the Input message request from the Sale System to the POI System (InputCommand data element). The output device attached to this input device is the CashierDisplay device.  Code: **CHST:** CashierStatus**:  Definition: To display to the Cashier a new state on which the POI is entering. 	For instance, during a payment, the POI could display to the Cashier that POI request an authorisation to the host acquirer.  Code: **CUDI:** CustomerDisplay**:  Definition: Standard Customer display interface used by the POI System to ask question, or to show information to the Customer inside a Service dialogue.  Code: **CUAS:** CustomerAssistance**:  Definition: Input of the Cardholder POI interface which can be entered by the Cashier to assist the Customer.  Code: **CUER:** CustomerError**:  Definition: To display to the Customer information is related to an error situation occurring on the Sale Terminal during a Sale transaction.  Code: **CUIN:** CustomerInput**:  Definition: Any kind of keyboard allowing all or part of the commands 	of the Input message request from the Sale System to the POI System (InputCommand data element).  Code: **POIR:** POIReplication**:  Definition: Information displayed on the Cardholder POI interface, replicated on the Cashier interface.  Code: **PRDC:** PrinterDocument**:  Definition: When the POI System wants to print specific document (check, dynamic currency conversion ...).  Code: **PRRP:** PrinterReceipt**:  Definition: Printer for the Payment receipt.  Code: **PRVC:** PrinterVoucher**:  Definition: Coupons, voucher or special ticket generated by the POI and to be printed.
